text: Basi katema kaŵakatile tama ya jwalakwe, ŵapite pakasyepela kuntemela. Jwankulungwa jwao jwatite: “Ana ngankuimanyilila yanti baba ŵenu ŵajigele kwa jenumanja chilanga chakulumbilila mwa Allah (chakuti tinchim’busya jwalakwejo kukwakwe)? Soni nkaniiŵe ayi mwalepele kunchengeta Yusufu. Basi ngangopoka m’chilambo muno mpakana akambe lusa baba, kapena Allah anamule (yakopoka pakungombolasya kun’jigala mpwangajo), soni Jwalakwe ni Jwambone nnope mwa akulamula.”
